etl.script: STATEMENT_ID, LINE_ID, POST_DATE, VALUE_DATE, CUR_CODE, WITHDRAWAL, DEPOSIT, TNX_TYPE, CUST_REF_ID, BO_REF_ID, BO_TNX_ID, ENTRY_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, RUNBAL_BOOKED, RUNBAL_CLEARED, CHEQUE_NUMBER, BRANCH_TELLER, REFERENCE_1, REFERENCE_2, REFERENCE_3, REFERENCE_4, REFERENCE_5,SUPPLEMENTARY_DETAILS
etl.query: SELECT A.STATEMENT_ID, A.LINE_ID, TO_CHAR(A.POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as POST_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.VALUE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as VALUE_DATE, A.CUR_CODE, A.WITHDRAWAL, A.DEPOSIT, A.TNX_TYPE, A.CUST_REF_ID, A.BO_REF_ID, A.BO_TNX_ID, A.ENTRY_TYPE, A.DESCRIPTION, A.RUNBAL_BOOKED, A.RUNBAL_CLEARED, A.CHEQUE_NUMBER, A.BRANCH_TELLER, A.REFERENCE_1, A.REFERENCE_2, A.REFERENCE_3, A.REFERENCE_4, A.REFERENCE_5, A.SUPPLEMENTARY_DETAILS From GTP_ACCOUNT_STATEMENT_LINE A, GTP_ACCOUNT_STATEMENT B, GTP_ACCOUNT C WHERE A.STATEMENT_ID = B.STATEMENT_ID and B.ACCOUNT_ID = C.ACCOUNT_ID and C.Bank_Abbv_Name = '$bank_name' $STATEMENT_ID, $LINE_ID, $POST_DATE, $VALUE_DATE, $CUR_CODE, $WITHDRAWAL, $DEPOSIT, $TNX_TYPE, $CUST_REF_ID, $BO_REF_ID, $BO_TNX_ID, $ENTRY_TYPE, $DESCRIPTION, $RUNBAL_BOOKED, $RUNBAL_CLEARED, $CHEQUE_NUMBER, $BRANCH_TELLER, $REFERENCE_1, $REFERENCE_2, $REFERENCE_3, $REFERENCE_4, $REFERENCE_5, $SUPPLEMENTARY_DETAILS
etl.script: AUDIT_ID, ACTION_CODE, COMPANY_ID, DATE_TIME, RESULT, TYPE, USER_ID, IP_ADDR
etl.query: SELECT A.AUDIT_ID, A.ACTION_CODE, A.COMPANY_ID, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as DATE_TIME, A.RESULT, A.TYPE, A.USER_ID, A.IP_ADDR from GTP_AUDIT A WHERE A.COMPANY_ID IN (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE Owner_Id = (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name')); $AUDIT_ID, $ACTION_CODE, $COMPANY_ID, $DATE_TIME, $RESULT, $TYPE, $USER_ID, $IP_ADDR
etl.script: MESSAGE_ID, BRCH_CODE, MAIN_BANK, COMPANY_ID, MESSAGE_TYPE, CREATION_DTTM, STATUS, RETRY_COUNT, TARGET, PROCESS_DTTM, CORRELATION_ID, KEY_1, KEY_2, KEY_3, KEY_4, KEY_5, KEY_6, FAILURE_REASON
etl.query: SELECT A.MESSAGE_ID, A.BRCH_CODE, A.MAIN_BANK, A.COMPANY_ID, A.MESSAGE_TYPE, TO_CHAR(A.CREATION_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as CREATION_DTTM, A.STATUS, A.RETRY_COUNT, A.TARGET, TO_CHAR(A.PROCESS_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as PROCESS_DTTM, A.CORRELATION_ID, A.KEY_1, A.KEY_2, A.KEY_3, A.KEY_4, A.KEY_5, A.KEY_6, A.FAILURE_REASON from GTP_INTERFACE_MESSAGE_KEYS A, GTP_COMPANY B where A.Company_Id = B.Company_Id and B.Owner_Id = (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name'); $MESSAGE_ID, $BRCH_CODE, $MAIN_BANK, $COMPANY_ID, $MESSAGE_TYPE, $CREATION_DTTM, $STATUS, $RETRY_COUNT, $TARGET, $PROCESS_DTTM, $CORRELATION_ID, $KEY_1, $KEY_2, $KEY_3, $KEY_4, $KEY_5, $KEY_6, $FAILURE_REASON
etl.script: REF_ID, TNX_ID, ROLE_ALIAS, PRODUCT_CODE, COMPANY_ID, BRCH_CODE, MAIN_BANK, PREVIOUS_USERS, CTL_DTTM
etl.query:
SELECT A.REF_ID, A.TNX_ID, A.ROLE_ALIAS, A.PRODUCT_CODE, A.COMPANY_ID, A.BRCH_CODE, A.MAIN_BANK, A.PREVIOUS_USERS, TO_CHAR(A.CTL_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as CTL_DTTM from GTP_PRODUCT_AUTHORISER_TNX A where A.COMPANY_ID IN (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE Owner_Id = (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name'));

SELECT A.COMPANY_ID, A.REF_ID, A.COUNTERSIGN_FLAG, A.IMP_BILL_REF_ID, A.SHIPPING_BY, A.SHIPPING_MODE, A.ALT_LC_REF_ID, A.DEAL_REF_ID, TO_CHAR(A.APPL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as APPL_DATE, A.APPLICANT_ABBV_NAME, A.APPLICANT_ADDRESS_LINE_1, A.APPLICANT_ADDRESS_LINE_2, A.APPLICANT_DOM, A.APPLICANT_COUNTRY, A.APPLICANT_NAME, A.APPLICANT_REFERENCE, A.BENEFICIARY_ABBV_NAME, A.BENEFICIARY_ADDRESS_LINE_1, A.BENEFICIARY_ADDRESS_LINE_2, A.BENEFICIARY_DOM, A.BENEFICIARY_COUNTRY, A.BENEFICIARY_NAME, A.BENEFICIARY_REFERENCE, A.BO_REF_ID, TO_CHAR(A.BOL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as BOL_DATE, A.BOL_NUMBER, A.BRCH_CODE, A.COMPANY_NAME, A.CUST_REF_ID, A.ENTITY, TO_CHAR(A.EXP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as EXP_DATE, A.FEE_ACT_NO, TO_CHAR(A.ISS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as ISS_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_SHIP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as LAST_SHIP_DATE, A.LI_AMT, A.LC_REF_ID, A.LI_CUR_CODE, A.LI_LIAB_AMT, A.BENE_TYPE_CODE, A.BENE_TYPE_OTHER, A.PRINCIPAL_ACT_NO, A.PROD_STAT_CODE, A.PRODUCT_CODE, A.MASTER_VERSION, A.SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, A.BULK_REF_ID, A.TRANS_DOC_TYPE_CODE, A.TRANS_DOC_TYPE_OTHER from GTP_PRODUCT_LI A, GTP_COMPANY B where A.Company_Id = B.Company_Id and B.Owner_Id = (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name');

PROJECTED_EXPIRY_DATE, A.RELEASE_AMT, A.ORIGINAL_XML, A.CLAIM_REFERENCE, A.CLAIM_AMT, A.CLAIM_CUR_CODE, TO_CHAR(A.CLAIM_PRESENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as CLAIM_PRESENT_DATE, A.DOC_REF_NO, A.CU_EFFECTIVE_DATE_TYPE_CODE, A.CU_EFFECTIVE_DATE_TYPE_DETAILS, A.CU_EXP_DATE_TYPE_CODE, TO_CHAR(A.CU_EXP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as CU_EXP_DATE, A.CU_EXP_EVENT, A.CU_SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, A.CU_CONF_INSTRUCTIONS, A.CU_CUR_CODE, A.CU_AMT, A.CU_LIAB_AMT, A.CU_AVAILABLE_AMT, A.CU_TOLERANCE_POSITIVE_PCT, A.CU_TOLERANCE_NEGATIVE_PCT, A.CU_CONSORTIUM, A.CU_CONSORTIUM_DETAILS, TO_CHAR(A.CU_RENEWAL_CALENDAR_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as CU_RENEWAL_CALENDAR_DATE, A.CU_RENEW_FOR_NB, A.CU_RENEW_FOR_PERIOD, A.CU_ADVISE_RENEWAL_FLAG, A.CU_ADVISE_RENEWAL_DAYS_NB, A.CU_ROLLING_RENEWAL_FLAG, A.CU_ROLLING_RENEW_ON_CODE, A.CU_ROLLING_RENEW_FOR_NB, A.CU_ROLLING_RENEW_FOR_PERIOD, A.CU_ROLLING_DAY_IN_MONTH, A.CU_ROLLING_RENEWAL_NB, A.CU_ROLLING_CANCELLATION_DAYS, A.CU_RENEW_AMT_CODE, TO_CHAR(A.CU_FINAL_EXPIRY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as CU_FINAL_EXPIRY_DATE, A.CU_TYPE_CODE, A.CU_RULE, A.CU_RULE_OTHER, A.CU_GOVERN_COUNTRY, A.CU_GOVERN_TEXT, A.CU_DEMAND_INDICATOR, A.CU_TRANSFER_INDICATOR, A.CU_TEXT_TYPE_CODE, A.CU_TEXT_TYPE_DETAILS, A.CU_TEXT_LANGUAGE, A.CU_TEXT_LANGUAGE_OTHER, A.BEI_CODE, A.CANCELLATION_REQ_FLAG, A.CUSTOMER_IDENTIFIER, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_SHIP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as LAST_SHIP_DATE, A.INCO_TERM, A.INCO_PLACE, A.BG_TOLERANCE_POSITIVE_PCT, A.BG_TOLERANCE_NEGATIVE_PCT, A.CR_AVL_BY_CODE, A.CU_CR_AVL_BY_CODE, A.REQ_CONF_PARTY, TO_CHAR(A.EXTENDED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as EXTENDED_DATE from GTP_PRODUCT_BG_TNX A, Gtp_Company b where A.Company_Id = B.Company_Id and B.Owner_Id = (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name');

etl.query: select A.CUSTOMER_ID, A.ACCOUNT_ID, A.REFERENCE, A.NICKNAME from GTP_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT A, GTP_COMPANY B where A.CUSTOMER_ID = B.COMPANY_ID and B.owner_id = (select company_id from gtp_company where abbv_name = '$bank_name'); $CUSTOMER_ID,$ACCOUNT_ID,$REFERENCE,$NICKNAME

select A.ENTITY_ID, A.ACCOUNT_ID, A.REFERENCE, A.NICK_NAME from GTP_ENTITY_ACCOUNT A, GTP_ACCOUNT B WHERE A.ACCOUNT_ID = B.ACCOUNT_ID AND B.BANK_ABBV_NAME = '$bank_name';
$ENTITY_ID,$ACCOUNT_ID,$REFERENCE,$NICK_NAME
etl.script: ENTITY_ID,ROLE_ID,ROLE_DESCRIPTION
etl.query: select A.ENTITY_ID, A.ROLE_ID, A.ROLE_DESCRIPTION from GTP_ENTITY_ROLE A, GTP_ENTITY B, GTP_COMPANY C WHERE A.Entity_Id = B.Entity_Id and B.Company_Id = C.Company_Id and C.Owner_Id = (select Company_Id from Gtp_Company where Abbv_Name = '$bank_name'); $ENTITY_ID,$ROLE_ID,$ROLE_DESCRIPTION

etl.query: select BENEFICIARY_ID, COMPANY_ID, ABBV_NAME, ACCESS_OPENED, ADDRESS_LINE_1, ADDRESS_LINE_2, BENEFICIARY_COMPANY_ABBV_NAME, BRCH_CODE, CONTACT_NAME, COUNTRY, DOM, EMAIL, ENTITY, FAX, NAME, NOTIFICATION_ENABLED, PHONE, REFERENCE, TELEX, WEB_ADDRESS, PRTRY_ID_TYPE, FSCM_ENABLED, CREDIT_NOTE_ENABLED, BUYER_ROLE, SELLER_ROLE, AUTOACCEPTANCE_DAY from GTP_MASTER_BENEFICIARY where COMPANY_ID IN (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE Owner_Id = (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name')); $BENEFICIARY_ID, $COMPANY_ID, $ABBV_NAME, $ACCESS_OPENED, $ADDRESS_LINE_1, $ADDRESS_LINE_2, $BENEFICIARY_COMPANY_ABBV_NAME, $BRCH_CODE, $CONTACT_NAME, $COUNTRY, $DOM, $EMAIL, $ENTITY, $FAX, $NAME, $NOTIFICATION_ENABLED, $PHONE, $REFERENCE, $TELEX, $WEB_ADDRESS, $PRTRY_ID_TYPE, $FSCM_ENABLED, $CREDIT_NOTE_ENABLED, $BUYER_ROLE, $SELLER_ROLE, $AUTOACCEPTANCE_DAY
etl.script: MATRIX_ID, COMPANY_ID, ENTITY, AMT_TYPE, BRCH_CODE, ISO_CODE, LMT_AMT, PRODUCT_CODE, SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, TNX_TYPE_CODE, SUB_TNX_TYPE_CODE, SEQUENTIAL, WILD_CARD_IND, ACCOUNT_NO, PRODUCT_TYPE_CODE, TENOR_TYPE_CODE
etl.query: select MATRIX_ID, COMPANY_ID, ENTITY, AMT_TYPE, BRCH_CODE, ISO_CODE, LMT_AMT, PRODUCT_CODE, SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, TNX_TYPE_CODE, SUB_TNX_TYPE_CODE, SEQUENTIAL, WILD_CARD_IND, ACCOUNT_NO, PRODUCT_TYPE_CODE, TENOR_TYPE_CODE from GTP_MATRIX where COMPANY_ID IN (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE Owner_Id = (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name')); $MATRIX_ID, $COMPANY_ID, $ENTITY, $AMT_TYPE, $BRCH_CODE, $ISO_CODE, $LMT_AMT, $PRODUCT_CODE, $SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, $TNX_TYPE_CODE, $SUB_TNX_TYPE_CODE, $SEQUENTIAL, $WILD_CARD_IND, $ACCOUNT_NO, $PRODUCT_TYPE_CODE, $TENOR_TYPE_CODE
etl.script: BRCH_CODE, PARM_ID, COMPANY_ID, KEY_1, KEY_2, KEY_3, KEY_4, KEY_5, KEY_6, KEY_7, KEY_8, KEY_9, WILD_CARD_IND, DATA_1, DATA_2, DATA_3, DATA_4, DATA_5, DATA_6, DATA_7, DATA_8, DATA_9, DATA_10, DATA_11, DATA_12, DATA_13, DATA_14, DATA_15, DATA_16, DATA_17, DATA_18, DATA_19, DATA_20, KEY_10, KEY_11, KEY_12, KEY_13, KEY_14, KEY_15, KEY_16, KEY_17, KEY_18, KEY_19, KEY_20
etl.query: select BRCH_CODE, PARM_ID, COMPANY_ID, KEY_1, KEY_2, KEY_3, KEY_4, KEY_5, KEY_6, KEY_7, KEY_8, KEY_9, WILD_CARD_IND, DATA_1, DATA_2, DATA_3, DATA_4, DATA_5, DATA_6, DATA_7, DATA_8, DATA_9, DATA_10, DATA_11, DATA_12, DATA_13, DATA_14, DATA_15, DATA_16, DATA_17, DATA_18, DATA_19, DATA_20, KEY_10, KEY_11, KEY_12, KEY_13, KEY_14, KEY_15, KEY_16, KEY_17, KEY_18, KEY_19, KEY_20 from GTP_PARAM_DATA $BRCH_CODE, $PARM_ID, $COMPANY_ID, $KEY_1, $KEY_2, $KEY_3, $KEY_4, $KEY_5, $KEY_6, $KEY_7, $KEY_8, $KEY_9, $WILD_CARD_IND, $DATA_1, $DATA_2, $DATA_3, $DATA_4, $DATA_5, $DATA_6, $DATA_7, $DATA_8, $DATA_9, $DATA_10, $DATA_11, $DATA_12, $DATA_13, $DATA_14, $DATA_15, $DATA_16, $DATA_17, $DATA_18, $DATA_19, $DATA_20, $KEY_10, $KEY_11, $KEY_12, $KEY_13, $KEY_14, $KEY_15, $KEY_16, $KEY_17, $KEY_18, $KEY_19, $KEY_20
etl.script: COMPANY_ID, REF_ID, APPL_DATE, APPLICANT_ABBV_NAME, APPLICANT_ACT_NO, APPLICANT_ACT_CUR_CODE, APPLICANT_ACT_NAME, APPLICANT_ACT_DESCRIPTION, APPLICANT_ADDRESS_LINE_1, APPLICANT_ADDRESS_LINE_2, APPLICANT_DOM, APPLICANT_NAME, APPLICANT_REFERENCE, BO_TNX_ID, BO_REF_ID, BRCH_CODE, COMPANY_NAME, CUST_REF_ID, ENTITY, EXP_DATE, ISS_DATE, VALUE_DATE, VALUE_DATE_TERM_NUMBER, VALUE_DATE_TERM_CODE, TD_AMT, TD_CUR_CODE, TD_LIAB_AMT, TD_TYPE, PROD_STAT_CODE, PRODUCT_CODE, MATURITY_DATE, MATURITY_DATE_TERM_NUMBER, MATURITY_DATE_TERM_CODE, ACCOUNT_ID, FEE_ACT_NO, CONTRACT_TYPE, RATE, INTEREST, TOTAL_WITH_INTEREST, INTEREST_CAPITALISATION, TRADE_ID, MASTER_VERSION, SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, BULK_REF_ID, PAYMENT_COMPLETED_INDICATOR, RECEIPT_COMPLETED_INDICATOR, PRODCODE, PRODTYPE
etl.query: select A.COMPANY_ID, A.REF_ID, TO_CHAR(A.APPL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as APPL_DATE, A.APPLICANT_ABBV_NAME, A.APPLICANT_ACT_NO, A.APPLICANT_ACT_CUR_CODE, A.APPLICANT_ACT_NAME, A.APPLICANT_ACT_DESCRIPTION, A.APPLICANT_ADDRESS_LINE_1, A.APPLICANT_ADDRESS_LINE_2, A.APPLICANT_DOM, A.APPLICANT_NAME, A.APPLICANT_REFERENCE, A.BO_TNX_ID, A.BO_REF_ID, A.BRCH_CODE, A.COMPANY_NAME, A.CUST_REF_ID, A.ENTITY, TO_CHAR(A.EXP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as EXP_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.ISS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as ISS_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.VALUE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as VALUE_DATE, A.VALUE_DATE_TERM_NUMBER, A.VALUE_DATE_TERM_CODE, A.TD_AMT, A.TD_CUR_CODE, A.TD_LIAB_AMT, A.TD_TYPE, A.PROD_STAT_CODE, A.PRODUCT_CODE, TO_CHAR(A.MATURITY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as MATURITY_DATE, A.MATURITY_DATE_TERM_NUMBER, A.MATURITY_DATE_TERM_CODE, A.ACCOUNT_ID, A.FEE_ACT_NO, A.CONTRACT_TYPE, A.RATE, A.INTEREST, A.TOTAL_WITH_INTEREST, A.INTEREST_CAPITALISATION, A.TRADE_ID, A.MASTER_VERSION, A.SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, A.BULK_REF_ID, A.PAYMENT_COMPLETED_INDICATOR, A.RECEIPT_COMPLETED_INDICATOR, A.PRODCODE, A.PRODTYPE from GTP_PRODUCT_TD A, GTP_COMPANY B where A.Company_Id = B.Company_Id and B.Owner_Id = (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name'); $COMPANY_ID, $REF_ID, $APPL_DATE, $APPLICANT_ABBV_NAME, $APPLICANT_ACT_NO, $APPLICANT_ACT_CUR_CODE, $APPLICANT_ACT_NAME, $APPLICANT_ACT_DESCRIPTION, $APPLICANT_ADDRESS_LINE_1, $APPLICANT_ADDRESS_LINE_2, $APPLICANT_DOM, $APPLICANT_NAME, $APPLICANT_REFERENCE, $BO_TNX_ID, $BO_REF_ID, $BRCH_CODE, $COMPANY_NAME, $CUST_REF_ID, $ENTITY, $EXP_DATE, $ISS_DATE, $VALUE_DATE, $VALUE_DATE_TERM_NUMBER, $VALUE_DATE_TERM_CODE, $TD_AMT, $TD_CUR_CODE, $TD_LIAB_AMT, $TD_TYPE, $PROD_STAT_CODE, $PRODUCT_CODE, $MATURITY_DATE, $MATURITY_DATE_TERM_NUMBER, $MATURITY_DATE_TERM_CODE, $ACCOUNT_ID, $FEE_ACT_NO, $CONTRACT_TYPE, $RATE, $INTEREST, $TOTAL_WITH_INTEREST, $INTEREST_CAPITALISATION, $TRADE_ID, $MASTER_VERSION, $SUB_PRODUCT_CODE, $BULK_REF_ID, $PAYMENT_COMPLETED_INDICATOR, $RECEIPT_COMPLETED_INDICATOR, $PRODCODE, $PRODTYPE
etl.script: USER_ID, ACTV_FLAG, ADDRESS_LINE_1, ADDRESS_LINE_2, COMPANY_ABBV_NAME, COMPANY_ID, COUNTRY, CREATED, CUR_CODE, DELETED, DOM, EMAIL, FAX, FIRST_NAME, LANGUAGE, LAST_NAME, LASTLOGIN, LOGIN_ID, MODIFIED, PASSWORD_VALUE, PHONE, REFERENCE, TIME_ZONE, ORG_LOGIN_ID, COUNTRY_SUB_DIV, COUNTY, COUNTRY_NAME, PENDING_TRANS_NOTIFY, ACCESS_COUNTER, CREATOR_COMPANY, CREATOR_ID, CREATOR_LOGIN, EMPLOYEE_DEPARTMENT, EMPLOYEE_NO, LEGAL_COUNTRY, LEGAL_NO, LEGAL_TYPE, LOCKED_TIME, LOGIN_ATTEMPTS, ONE_FA_LAST_LOGIN, PASSWORD_EXPIRY, PASSWORD_MIGRATED, REAUTH_MODE, TERMS_CONDS_ACCEPT_DATE, COMPANY_DEFAULT_USER, CORRESPONDENCE_LANGUAGE, RMGROUP, LAST_PASSWORD_CHANGE_DATE, PASSWORD_SHA2_MIGRATED
etl.query:
select USER_ID, ACTV_FLAG, ADDRESS_LINE_1, ADDRESS_LINE_2, COMPANY_ABBV_NAME, COMPANY_ID, COUNTRY, TO_CHAR(CREATED, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as CREATED, CUR_CODE, TO_CHAR(DELETED, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as DELETED, DOM, EMAIL, FAX, FIRST_NAME, LANGUAGE, LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR(LASTLOGIN, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as LASTLOGIN, LOGIN_ID, TO_CHAR(MODIFIED, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as MODIFIED, PASSWORD_VALUE, PHONE, REFERENCE, TIME_ZONE, ORG_LOGIN_ID, COUNTRY_SUB_DIV, COUNTY, COUNTRY_NAME, PENDING_TRANS_NOTIFY, ACCESS_COUNTER, CREATOR_COMPANY, CREATOR_ID, CREATOR_LOGIN, EMPLOYEE_DEPARTMENT, EMPLOYEE_NO, LEGAL_COUNTRY, LEGAL_NO, LEGAL_TYPE, TO_CHAR(DELETED, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as LOCKED_TIME, LOGIN_ATTEMPTS, TO_CHAR(ONE_FA_LAST_LOGIN, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as ONE_FA_LAST_LOGIN, TO_CHAR(PASSWORD_EXPIRY, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as PASSWORD_EXPIRY, PASSWORD_MIGRATED, REAUTH_MODE, TO_CHAR(TERMS_CONDS_ACCEPT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as TERMS_CONDS_ACCEPT_DATE, COMPANY_DEFAULT_USER, CORRESPONDENCE_LANGUAGE, RMGROUP, TO_CHAR(LAST_PASSWORD_CHANGE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as LAST_PASSWORD_CHANGE_DATE, PASSWORD_SHA2_MIGRATED from GTP_USER WHERE company_id IN (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE owner_id = (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name' ) UNION (SELECT company_iD FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name' ) );
$USER_ID, $ACTV_FLAG, $ADDRESS_LINE_1, $ADDRESS_LINE_2, $COMPANY_ABBV_NAME, $COMPANY_ID, $COUNTRY, $CREATED, $CUR_CODE, $DELETED, $DOM, $EMAIL, $FAX, $FIRST_NAME, $LANGUAGE, $LAST_NAME, $LASTLOGIN, $LOGIN_ID, $MODIFIED, $PASSWORD_VALUE, $PHONE, $REFERENCE, $TIME_ZONE, $ORG_LOGIN_ID, $COUNTRY_SUB_DIV, $COUNTY, $COUNTRY_NAME, $PENDING_TRANS_NOTIFY, $ACCESS_COUNTER, $CREATOR_COMPANY, $CREATOR_ID, $CREATOR_LOGIN, $EMPLOYEE_DEPARTMENT, $EMPLOYEE_NO, $LEGAL_COUNTRY, $LEGAL_NO, $LEGAL_TYPE, $LOCKED_TIME, $LOGIN_ATTEMPTS, $ONE_FA_LAST_LOGIN, $PASSWORD_EXPIRY, $PASSWORD_MIGRATED, $REAUTH_MODE, $TERMS_CONDS_ACCEPT_DATE, $COMPANY_DEFAULT_USER, $CORRESPONDENCE_LANGUAGE, $RMGROUP, $LAST_PASSWORD_CHANGE_DATE, $PASSWORD_SHA2_MIGRATED
etl.script: USER_ACCOUNT_ID, USER_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, ENTITY_ID, CONTEXT_KEY, CONTEXT_VALUE
etl.query:
select A.USER_ACCOUNT_ID, A.USER_ID, A.ACCOUNT_ID, A.ENTITY_ID, A.CONTEXT_KEY, A.CONTEXT_VALUE from GTP_USER_ACCOUNT A, GTP_USER B, GTP_COMPANY C where A.User_Id = b.user_id and B.Company_Id = c.company_id and c.owner_id = (select company_id from gtp_company where abbv_name = '$bank_name');
$USER_ACCOUNT_ID, $USER_ID, $ACCOUNT_ID, $ENTITY_ID, $CONTEXT_KEY, $CONTEXT_VALUE
etl.script: ENTITY_ID, USER_ID, USER_ABBV_NAME, ABBV_NAME, LIMIT_CUR_CODE, LIMIT_AMT, DEFAULT_ENTITY
etl.query:
select A.ENTITY_ID, A.USER_ID, A.USER_ABBV_NAME, A.ABBV_NAME, A.LIMIT_CUR_CODE, A.LIMIT_AMT, A.DEFAULT_ENTITY from GTP_USER_ENTITY A, GTP_ENTITY B, GTP_COMPANY C where A.Entity_Id = B.Entity_Id and B.Company_Id = C.company_id and C.Owner_Id = (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name');
$ENTITY_ID, $USER_ID, $USER_ABBV_NAME, $ABBV_NAME, $LIMIT_CUR_CODE, $LIMIT_AMT, $DEFAULT_ENTITY
etl.script: USER_ID, GROUP_ID, ROLE_ID, LIMIT_CUR_CODE, LIMIT_AMT
etl.query: select A.USER_ID, A.GROUP_ID, A.ROLE_ID, A.LIMIT_CUR_CODE, A.LIMIT_AMT from GTP_USER_GROUP_ROLE A WHERE A.USER_ID IN ( (SELECT DISTINCT B.USER_ID from GTP_USER B where B.COMPANY_ID IN (Select company_id from GTP_COMPANY where owner_id = (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name'))) UNION (SELECT distinct C.User_Id FROM gtp_user C WHERE C.company_id IN (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name')) ); $USER_ID, $GROUP_ID, $ROLE_ID, $LIMIT_CUR_CODE, $LIMIT_AMT
etl.script: REF_ID, COMPANY_ID, ROLE_CODE, ABBV_NAME, ADDRESS_LINE_1, ADDRESS_LINE_2, BRCH_CODE, CONTACT_NAME, COUNTRY, DOM, ADDRESS_LINE_4, EMAIL, FAX, ISO_CODE, NAME, PHONE, REFERENCE, TELEX, WEB_ADDRESS
etl.query:
select REF_ID, COMPANY_ID, ROLE_CODE, ABBV_NAME, ADDRESS_LINE_1, ADDRESS_LINE_2, BRCH_CODE, CONTACT_NAME, COUNTRY, DOM, ADDRESS_LINE_4, EMAIL, FAX, ISO_CODE, NAME, PHONE, REFERENCE, TELEX, WEB_ADDRESS from GTP_PRODUCT_BANK where COMPANY_ID IN (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE Owner_Id = (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name'));
$REF_ID, $COMPANY_ID, $ROLE_CODE, $ABBV_NAME, $ADDRESS_LINE_1, $ADDRESS_LINE_2, $BRCH_CODE, $CONTACT_NAME, $COUNTRY, $DOM, $ADDRESS_LINE_4, $EMAIL, $FAX, $ISO_CODE, $NAME, $PHONE, $REFERENCE, $TELEX, $WEB_ADDRESS
etl.script: REF_ID, TNX_ID, ROLE_CODE, ABBV_NAME, ADDRESS_LINE_1, ADDRESS_LINE_2, BRCH_CODE, COMPANY_ID, CONTACT_NAME, COUNTRY, DOM, ADDRESS_LINE_4, EMAIL, FAX, ISO_CODE, NAME, PHONE, REFERENCE, TELEX, WEB_ADDRESS
etl.query:
select REF_ID, TNX_ID, ROLE_CODE, ABBV_NAME, ADDRESS_LINE_1, ADDRESS_LINE_2, BRCH_CODE, COMPANY_ID, CONTACT_NAME, COUNTRY, DOM, ADDRESS_LINE_4, EMAIL, FAX, ISO_CODE, NAME, PHONE, REFERENCE, TELEX, WEB_ADDRESS from GTP_PRODUCT_BANK_TNX where COMPANY_ID IN (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE Owner_Id = (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name'));
$REF_ID, $TNX_ID, $ROLE_CODE, $ABBV_NAME, $ADDRESS_LINE_1, $ADDRESS_LINE_2, $BRCH_CODE, $COMPANY_ID, $CONTACT_NAME, $COUNTRY, $DOM, $ADDRESS_LINE_4, $EMAIL, $FAX, $ISO_CODE, $NAME, $PHONE, $REFERENCE, $TELEX, $WEB_ADDRESS
etl.script: REF_ID, INVOICE_REF_ID, INVOICE_REFERENCE, INVOICE_CURRENCY, INVOICE_AMOUNT, INVOICE_SETTLEMENT_AMT, BRCH_CODE, COMPANY_ID
etl.query: select A.REF_ID, A.INVOICE_REF_ID, A.INVOICE_REFERENCE, A.INVOICE_CURRENCY, A.INVOICE_AMOUNT, A.INVOICE_SETTLEMENT_AMT, A.BRCH_CODE, A.COMPANY_ID from GTP_PRODUCT_CN_INV A, GTP_COMPANY B where A.Company_Id = B.Company_Id and B.Owner_Id = (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name'); $REF_ID, $INVOICE_REF_ID, $INVOICE_REFERENCE, $INVOICE_CURRENCY, $INVOICE_AMOUNT, $INVOICE_SETTLEMENT_AMT, $BRCH_CODE, $COMPANY_ID
etl.script: REF_ID, TNX_ID, INVOICE_REF_ID, INVOICE_REFERENCE, INVOICE_CURRENCY, INVOICE_AMOUNT, INVOICE_SETTLEMENT_AMT, BRCH_CODE, COMPANY_ID
etl.query:
select A.REF_ID, A.TNX_ID, A.INVOICE_REF_ID, A.INVOICE_REFERENCE, A.INVOICE_CURRENCY, A.INVOICE_AMOUNT, A.INVOICE_SETTLEMENT_AMT, A.BRCH_CODE, A.COMPANY_ID from GTP_PRODUCT_CN_INV_TNX A, GTP_COMPANY B where A.Company_Id = B.Company_Id and B.Owner_Id = (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name');
$REF_ID, $TNX_ID, $INVOICE_REF_ID, $INVOICE_REFERENCE, $INVOICE_CURRENCY, $INVOICE_AMOUNT, $INVOICE_SETTLEMENT_AMT, $BRCH_CODE, $COMPANY_ID
etl.script: ERROR_ID, REF_ID, TNX_ID, BRCH_CODE, ERROR_CODE, PROCESS, GRAVITY, LINE_NUMBER, COLUMN_NUMBER, ERROR_VALUE, CHILD_TNX_ID, ERROR_LEVEL, SOURCE_ID, ERROR_ARGS
etl.query: select ERROR_ID, REF_ID, TNX_ID, BRCH_CODE, ERROR_CODE, PROCESS, GRAVITY, LINE_NUMBER, COLUMN_NUMBER, ERROR_VALUE, CHILD_TNX_ID, ERROR_LEVEL, SOURCE_ID, ERROR_ARGS from GTP_PRODUCT_ERROR $ERROR_ID, $REF_ID, $TNX_ID, $BRCH_CODE, $ERROR_CODE, $PROCESS, $GRAVITY, $LINE_NUMBER, $COLUMN_NUMBER, $ERROR_VALUE, $CHILD_TNX_ID, $ERROR_LEVEL, $SOURCE_ID, $ERROR_ARGS
etl.script: REF_ID, LS_REF_ID, LS_NUMBER, LS_ALLOCATED_AMT, LS_AMT, LS_OS_AMT, CONVERTED_OS_AMT, ALLOW_OVERDRAW, BRCH_CODE, COMPANY_ID, BO_REF_ID
etl.query: select A.REF_ID, A.LS_REF_ID, A.LS_NUMBER, A.LS_ALLOCATED_AMT, A.LS_AMT, A.LS_OS_AMT, A.CONVERTED_OS_AMT, A.ALLOW_OVERDRAW, A.BRCH_CODE, A.COMPANY_ID, A.BO_REF_ID from GTP_PRODUCT_LS_LINK A, GTP_COMPANY B where A.Company_Id = B.Company_Id and B.Owner_Id = (SELECT company_id FROM gtp_company WHERE abbv_name = '$bank_name'); $REF_ID, $LS_REF_ID, $LS_NUMBER, $LS_ALLOCATED_AMT, $LS_AMT, $LS_OS_AMT, $CONVERTED_OS_AMT, $ALLOW_OVERDRAW, $BRCH_CODE, $COMPANY_ID, $BO_REF_ID
